metadata.title: CVE-2023-49465 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Libde265 v1.0.14 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability in the derive_spatial_luma_vector_prediction function atmotion.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.3
libde265-examples - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.8-1ubuntu0.3').
